snippet: In flat, unemotional tones, a murderer known as the Rifleman continued his testimony against James (Whitey) Bulger.
abstract: Stephen Flemmi, former partner of James (Whitey) Bulger, gives four hours of understated but horrifying testimony at Bulger's trial; gives chilling details of Bulgers's murder of Debra Davis, who had been Flemmi's girlfriend.
lead_paragraph: In flat, unemotional tones, a murderer known as the Rifleman continued his testimony against James (Whitey) Bulger.

headline.main: Former Bulger Partner Relates Chilling Details of Girlfriend’s Killing
headline.print_headline: Former Bulger Partner Relates Chilling Details Of Girlfriend’s Killing
